messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Many Subjects
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks, Bridget-- I also remembered that Nat l Geog. Mags often have great pull-outs, maps and such, and  a constellation diagram could  possiblybe found,too.
messages.messageBody:
Thanks, Bridget-- I also remembered that Nat'l Geog. Mags often have great
pull-outs, maps and such, and a constellation diagram could possiblybe
found,too. Likewise, newsstands and bookstores carry such an array of mags.,
that it is likely there are mags. about astronomy with all kinds of diagrams
available. Sorry to go on and on, I guess I'm on a roll...:)
Karen

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Many Subjects
messages.msgSnippet: I have a paper mache project to work on.  It calls for wheat paste.  Is there a paste I can make from common household stuff, or do I have to buy something
messages.messageBody:
I have a paper mache project to work on. It calls for wheat paste. Is there
a paste I can make from common household stuff, or do I have to buy something
specific?

Jill
